ygData.subject: Re: Shadow Wing
ygData.msgSnippet: Veratis stepped back, recoiling from the sight of Shadow Wing lashing out. The CR chamber sensed the struggling and released a sedative into the fluid

Veratis stepped back, recoiling from the sight of Shadow Wing lashing out.
The CR chamber sensed the struggling and released a sedative into the fluid
surrounding Shadow Wing. that would calm her down and reduce the chance of
damage to either her or the chamber. The down side was that the sedative was
now another factor in the virus. he knew that mixxing chemicals was a bad
idea, especially when one doesn't know the result of the first factor.
Veratis stepped back to the sensors and watched carefully for the results of
the virus.


----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>>
> Shadow Wing::
>
> She groaned as he put her into the chamber. Her head started to real
> as she started drifting in and out of consiousness due to the pain.
> She heard his thoughts, I'm sorry Shadow Wing.  she projected to
> him,"What are you sorry for?"  Then the stuff in the vial started to
> enter her systems.  The pain became over whelming. "NOOOOOOOOO!"
> She kicked and punched and hit the walls inside the chamber.  Her
> body was reforming.  It was almost too much.  She screamed out and
> hit the walls of the chamber. "LET ME OUT!"
>
> She stopped hitting the walls as her body went into convulsions. her
> arms and legs flailing around.  Her massive paws banged loudly
> against the walls.
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > OOC Sorry logo they're in ice and snow. no grass or flowers.
> >
> > Bic: Veratis grabbed his temples feeling the pain Shadow Wing was
> going
> > through. He grabbed her under the arms and helped her back to his
> lab. A CR
> > chamber opened at his command and he placed her inside. It was as
> he feared,
> > the protoform in her was rejecting the Polarbear DNA. He stabilized
> her
> > condition for now but ran the risk of losing her if nothing was
> done soon.
> > He scanned her system and found every cell in her body
> deteriorating. He saw
> > no other action open to him. He opened a compartment on the wall
> and removed
> > the vial. "I'm sorry Shadow Wing"He thought as he approached the
> chamber.
> >
> > "Override Viral search." he instructed the computer while carefully
> carrying
> > the vial to the chamber. He injected the liquid into the CR
> chambers intake
> > hose and in turn into Shadow Wings system. Now all he could do was
> wait for
> > the results.
> >
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: <logomorph@h...>
> > To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> > Sent: Friday, November 03, 2000 9:04 AM
> > Subject: Shadow Wing
> >
> >
> > > Shadow Wing::
> > >
> > > She walked around looking for Veratis.  She finally found him and
> > > smiled. "I like this new form.  I can see so much better now. The
> > > grass is greener, the sky is bluer, the flowers have such vibrant
> > > color.  ANd my sence of smell is wild. I can smell a rabbit that
> is
> > > in the next sector almost.   It's great. I don't know how to
> > > thank...." she looked at him as a wave of pain ran over her.  She
> > > fell to the ground and groaned. The new programs were in conflict
> > > with te form and it's new abilities. She sent the mental message
> of
> > > fear and pain without realizing it.  She tried to get up but fell
> > > over again. "what's happening? what's wrong with...." she groaned
> > > loudly and let out a low bear growl.
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >
>
